mean_cn: n. 欢庆，欢宴，庆典，欢乐
mean_en: enjoyable activities at the time of a holiday or other special occasion :festive activities
sentence: We celebrate the festivities of traditional Chinese festivals in various ways.
sentence_trans: 我们用不同方式庆祝中国传统节日庆典。
word_etyma: fest节目 ＋ ivity表示情况、状态 → 表演节目的日子 → 节日 → festivity喜庆
